messages.zh: 第十六关（后）
messages.en: level 16(post)

messages.zh: 前方清理完毕。
messages.en: Area ahead cleared.

messages.zh: 你们也走快点！
messages.en: You, make haste!
……Hah……Who were those people……hah……

messages.zh: 各位，请加快速度！
messages.en: Everyone, we need to speed up!

messages.zh: 阿米娅，有追兵，我们来不来得及反击？
messages.en: Amiya, we’ve got tails behind us. Do we have time to fight back?

messages.zh: 尽可能甩开他们，避免无谓的战斗——！
messages.en: Try to outrun them. Avoid unnecessary battles——!

messages.zh: 能天使，先不说安全问题了......我需要一条能最快抵达这个地点的路线。
messages.en: Exusiai, forget about safety now……I need a fastest route to this location.

messages.zh: 这些家伙已经发现了我们的踪迹......花费的时间越长，罗德岛的处境越危险！
messages.en: These people have hooked on to us……The longer time we take, the more dangerous we are!

messages.zh: 这好办，我这有一条敌人想不到的。
messages.en: Piece of cake, I’ve got one they won’t expect.

messages.zh: 你已经有主意了？
messages.en: You’ve got an idea?

messages.zh: 当然~不过要说可不可靠，我还得亲自去踩点看看。
messages.en: Of course~But if you ask how reliable it is, I need to check it out myself first.

messages.zh: 请加油。
messages.en: Please hurry.

messages.zh: 好嘞~我先去了，马上回来！
messages.en: Ok~off I go now, I’ll be back soon!

messages.zh: ......我可以问问——我们要去哪里吗？
messages.en: ……Can I ask——where are we going?

messages.zh: 我们会与近卫局汇合。龙门近卫局会负责保护你。
messages.en: We’re going to meet up with the Guard Bureau. Lungmen Guard Bureau will be guarantee your safety.
……Huh?

messages.zh: ......龙门近卫局？
messages.en: Lungmen Guard Bureau?

messages.zh: 我们的任务就是把你安全的移交给近卫局，由他们进行暂时的保护。
messages.en: Our mission is to escort you to the Guard Bureau safely, and put you under their temporary protection.

messages.zh: ......我差点就以为，你们真的是来救我的了。
messages.en: ……I almost believed, that you really came to save me.

messages.zh: ......在龙门，近卫局对你的保护是最安全的。
messages.en: ……In Lungmen, the Guard Bureau is the safest place for you.

messages.zh: 如果我们不行动，你就会遭遇更大的危险。
messages.en: If we don’t act, you’ll be in greater danger.

messages.zh: 许多尝试抢夺你的感染者，身上都戴着整合运动的标志——
messages.en: Many of the Infected trying to capture you, they bear the symbol of Reunion Movement——

messages.zh: 我不知道什么整合运动......我记不清......
messages.en: ——I don’t know about the Reunion Movement……I can’t remember……

messages.zh: 但我知道近卫局，也看到过近卫局怎么对待感染者！
messages.en: But I know about the Guard Bureau, and I have seen how they treat the Infected!

messages.zh: 你们这些......家伙......骗了我......！你们要把我怎么样！
messages.en: You……lied to me……! What are you going to do to me!
……I’m sorry.

messages.zh: 有些误会现在还没法解开。
messages.en: Some misunderstandings can’t be resolved now.

messages.zh: 无论你觉得我们有多恶劣——抱歉......请你先忍耐一下。
messages.en: No matter how vile you think we are——sorry……please endure for a while now.

messages.zh: 比起你的心情，还是你的安全更重要。
messages.en: Compared with your mood, your safety is more important.

messages.zh: 如果有机会，我会解释一切。
messages.en: If there is a chance, I’ll explain everything.
